name: HelloGrandparents
0:
”Alexa, open Hello Grandparents and Grandma and Grandpa are here.”
”Alexa, open Hello Grandparents and look its Grandma and Grandpa.”
”Alexa, open Hello Grandparents and say hello to Grandma and Grandpa.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: hello grandparents
des: A great way to impress the grandparents. When you tell Alexa that the grandma and grandpa are here (or 'say hi to grandma and grandpa'), she will respond with one of four friendly welcomes. With four possible responses, you have several ways to show the grandparents how Alexa works.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
